Congratulatory letter to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Congratulatory letter to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 10th anniversary of his election as Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
 The letter was handed to Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun on Tuesday by Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK who is doyen of the diplomatic corps. 
 A floral basket and a congratulatory letter were sent to him by the military attaches corps here.    
 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were handed to Kim Il Chol, Minister of the People's Armed Forces, on Tuesday by Yan Jianfeng, military attache of the Chinese embassy who is doyen of the attaches corps.

More groups for study of Juche idea formed
articles.content:
More groups for study of Juche idea formed
    Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung is shining as the immortal guiding idea indicating the road of the new century as well as the 20th century for its truth, scientific accuracy and validity.
 According to data available, more than 110 groups for the study of the Juche idea were inaugurated in different countries in last 9 years from August Juche 83 (1994) to March Juche 92 (2003). Among them are the Youth Forum for Self-Reliance Studies in Nepal, the Pakistan Society for the Study of Independence, the Firenze Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Italy, the Romanian Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Ecuadorian Group of Young Soldiers of Juche.    
 Groups for studying and applying the Juche idea, the recognized guiding idea indicating the road of our era, the era of independence, are on the increase on a worldwide scale.

articles.title: Floral basket to Kim Il Sung's statue
articles.content:
Floral basket to Kim Il Sung's statue
    Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Yasser Arafat, President of the State of Palestine, sent a floral basket to the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the anniversary of his birth.
 Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK, placed the floral basket before his statue and made a bow today.    
 Written on the ribbon of the floral basket were letters " The Great Leader Kim Il Sung Will Be Immortal".
